replies.bodyText:
Yeah this is a format string, not a parameterized log string. By parameterized, we mean:
"Invalid URI of {} set for logout redirect uri. Users will not be redirected to {} upon logout."
replies.author: Lambeaux

timeline.bodyText: ✏️ This is more of a redirect path and not a URI.
timeline.author: pklinef

timeline.bodyText:
❓ Should we instead add the ability to point to any URL which could include an external security system?  I am not sure if we should always assume DDF will handle logout.  For example, you could logout of Keycloak directly instead of redirecting from the DDF logout servlet.
https://www.keycloak.org/docs/latest/securing_apps/index.html#logout
timeline.author: pklinef
